item.title: PINS
item.description: score:63 Chances: Pinterest, Inc. (NYSE:PINS) saw a significant share price rise of over 20% in the past couple of months on the NYSE. A growing partnership with Amazon and strengthening advertising business make Pinterest a standout stock for 2024, RBC says. Impulse purchases arenâ€™t going away any time soon, and Pinterest stands to benefit, one analyst team argued.
